Name: ContainerNursery
Overview: Puts Docker Containers to sleep and wakes them back up when they're needed.

CN_LOG_LEVEL.Name: CN_LOG_LEVEL
CN_LOG_LEVEL.Description:
Sets the minimum log level. Log entries below this importance level won't be printed to the console. Defaults to info.
Available values: debug / info / warn / error

CN_LOG_JSON.Name: CN_LOG_JSON
CN_LOG_JSON.Description:
If set to true all logging is done in a machine readable format (JSON). Defaults to false.
Available values: true / false

Config directory.Name: Config directory
Config directory.Description: Where the config.yml file should be stored.

Docker Socket.Name: Docker Socket
Docker Socket.Description: Should point to /var/run/docker.sock to be able to control the docker instance.
